Section.Catchline: Bank’s rights and duties with respect to deposit account.

SectionBody.Text: Except as otherwise provided in s. 679.340(3), and unless the bank otherwise agrees in an authenticated record, a bank’s rights and duties with respect to a deposit account maintained with the bank are not terminated, suspended, or modified by:

Subsection.Text: The creation, attachment, or perfection of a security interest in the deposit account;
The bank’s knowledge of the security interest; or
The bank’s receipt of instructions from the secured party.
